meta.title: ARGO'S PACK - Premium Pet Products
meta.description: ARGO'S PACK - Premium products for your pet's care and well-being. Discover our line of products designed with love for your faithful companion.
meta.ogDescription: Premium products for your pet's care and well-being. Discover our line of products designed with love for your faithful companion.

hero.description: At ARGO'S PACK we believe that every pet deserves the best. Our products are designed with dedication and superior quality to ensure the well-being, comfort and happiness of your faithful companion.
hero.imageAlt: Happy pet with ARGO'S PACK products

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Selected and tested products to guarantee maximum quality and durability.

love.title: Made with Love
love.description: Every product is designed with your pet's well-being and happiness in mind.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We incorporate the latest trends and technologies in pet products.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: All our products meet the highest safety and quality standards.

carrier.name: Premium Expandable Carrier
carrier.description: Carrier for cats, small dogs and pets up to 20lbs with rechargeable interior LED light. TSA approved for airlines. Expandable side walls, 4 doors and removable pad.
